query: Summarize the key differences between REST and GraphQL APIs
Explain the CAP theorem and give an example of each trade-off
What are the pros and cons of using Kubernetes vs Docker Compose for a small team?
Design a real-time fraud detection system that processes 10 million credit card transactions per day with sub-100ms latency. Include the data pipeline, ML model serving, and alerting architecture.
Write a Python implementation of a distributed rate limiter using Redis that supports sliding window, token bucket, and leaky bucket algorithms with configurable per-user limits.
Analyze the trade-offs between event sourcing and traditional CRUD for a multi-tenant SaaS platform with audit requirements. Consider consistency, scalability, and operational complexity.
Compare transformer attention mechanisms (self-attention, cross-attention, grouped-query attention) and explain when each is optimal for different sequence lengths and hardware constraints.
